Authors:
JANAÍNE ROSSANE ARAÚJO SILVA-CABRAL, Lourdes Regina Lopes
Batista, Jaqueline Figueredo de Oliveira Costa, Mayra Machado de
Medeiros Ferro, Sarah Jacqueline Cavalcanti Silva, Gaus Silvestre
Andrade Lima, Iraildes Pereira Assuncao
Title:
FIRST REPORT OF Colletotrichum tropicale CAUSING ANTHRACNOSE
ON POMAGRANATE IN BRAZIL
Abstract:
This is the first report of C. tropicale on pomegranate
fruits in the world based on multi-gene phylogenetic analysis and
morpho-cultural characteristics.
